Room.Name: The Trail to Miden'nir
Room.Description: You are in a light forest. A path leads south, but the passage to the east is easy enough. To the west, smoke can be seen rising above the treetops. The sprawl of Midgaard lies north of here.

Exit.Description: More light forest.
The Woodsman's Inn.

ExtraDescription.Description: +-------------------------------------------------+ | This area originally written for Copper II DIKU | | by ? | | Modifications and alterations for MERCmud DIKU | | by VampLestat 1 JAN 93 | +-------------------------------------------------+

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: You are in a dark forest. To the east, mountains block passage. From here, only the lighter forest to the west or south offer a way to travel.

Exit.Description: The forest is darker to the south.
The forest gets lighter as you go west.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Exit.Description: More and darker woods.

Room.Name: On a Small Path
Room.Description: A path is here, leading east and south through the dark woods of Miden'nir. Mountains slash the scenery to the west of here.

Exit.Description: To the south, the trail continues.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The trees of Miden'nir are lush and green, hiding the evil that lurks in these woods. The trees become too thick to the west, but you may go north, south or travel toward the mountains that lie east of here.

Exit.Description: The trees lighten up a bit this way.
Huge grey mountains lie in this direction.
The forest continues.

Room.Name: A Crossroads
Room.Description: Here footworn paths meet leading north, south and east. The trees seem to be closing in on you at this point, and you can barely see the sky through the thick branches above your head.

Exit.Description: Trees as far as the eye can see.
There is an especially dark part of the forest this way.
There is an especially dark section of forest this way.

Room.Name: The Trail
Room.Description: You are on a north-south trail through the woods. To the west, impassable mountains glare at you, and the thick woods and undergrowth prevent any movement westward.

Exit.Description: The trail bends to the north.
To the south, the path re-enters the forest.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The trees of Miden'nir are lush and green, hiding the evil that lurks in these woods. You can go north toward the mountains, or west to the forest, but the steep mountains prevent any movement east.

Exit.Description: A light section of forest.
The forest continues here.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The forest is dark, and becomes even darker west. You sense that there is something evil hidden in these woods. The forest gets lighter to the north. The wind kicks up as you ponder your options.

Exit.Description: There is a small clearing to the north.
It gets darker and thicker this way.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Exit.Description: More forest.
Lighter forest and mountains in the distance.
More trees.

Room.Name: Light Forest
Room.Description: The forest is light here and you can easily pick your way through the trail. To the east, the forest becomes thick and darker. South, the trail continues.

Exit.Description: A trail leading north-south.
The trees get thicker as you go east.
More trees and some small hills.

Room.Name: Muddy Ground
Room.Description: The ground is quite muddy here and puddles are all around. Your boots make a disgusting SQUISH as you walk here. You can go in any of the four cardinal directions from here. Hopefully, it will be dryer.

Exit.Description: The Miden'nir continues.
More trees.
The trees get VERY thick to the south. You can barely see...
Some light trees and daylight.

Room.Name: Near the Mountains
Room.Description: The most prominent feature here is the mountains that lie to the east. You can only go north and west from here as the rocks stop all other movement.

Exit.Description: Many trees to the north.
There is a bit of a slope downward to the west.

Room.Name: The Fading Trail
Room.Description: The trail becomes nearly unpassable here. You can go north as the forest is relatively light. To the south, you can see a path.

Exit.Description: You can see a trail this way.
Dark forests.

Room.Name: The Dark Path
Room.Description: You are hemmed in by trees on either side of you. The path continues north and south, and while is much to thick to explore west, you can head off into the woods to the east.

Exit.Description: The forest gets lighter this way.
The forest continues.
There is a strong stench coming from this direction.

Room.Name: The Dark Forest
Room.Description: You stomp your way through the underbrush. The dark forest of Miden'nir get pretty thick here, and the branches high above your head are so thick that they block out all direct sunlight. While it is much too thick to go further east, you might be able to make your way though the forest to the south and west.

Exit.Description: The thick forest continues.
The thick forest continues.

Room.Name: Carnage
Room.Description: Here, you see a gruesome sight. Blood is everywhere... on the trees and soaked into the ground. Two carcasses lie in front of you, seeming to look up at you. The forest is impassible to the south, but the other directions look ok.

Exit.Description: Darkness...
Your light does not extend that far.
More dark forest.

ExtraDescription.Keyword: carcass body corpse carcasses bodies corpses
ExtraDescription.Description: The corpses looked as if they have been pierced by a large, jagged spear. The damage these people sustained is simply amazing. Worse, the lips on the bodies are a light shade of blue, hinting at poison in their systems.

Room.Name: Deep in the Forest of Miden'nir
Room.Description: There is a sickening stench here. It smells of blood and death. To the north, you catch glimpses of daylight. To the east, you simply cannot see. The trees are close and stifling.

Exit.Description: You see daylight and a trail to follow.
The stench seems to becoming from this direction.

Room.Name: The Dark Forest
Room.Description: The branches above you block out all direct sunlight, making the forest in this area rather dark. The forest continues east, where it meets the mountains. The air is still and stuffy - a stench comes from the west and an ugly feeling causes the hair to rise on the back of your neck!

Exit.Description: It appears to get much darker that direction.
The sky becomes lighter in this direction.

Room.Name: Along the Eastern Road
Room.Description: You are walking along a well-travelled road between Midgaard and lands east. A northern road crosses this one to the west, towards Midgaard. You hear faint, happy singing to the north.

Exit.Description: The road continues to the east.

Room.Name: Along the Eastern Road
Room.Description: You are travelling down the eastern road between Midgaard and the eastern lands. The road back to Midgaard is west of you, and a heavily guarded checkpoint is east. A beautiful grove of trees is north, and a dirt path wanders off to the south.

Exit.Description: The road continues west towards a guarded checkpoint.
The road continues west towards midgaard.

Room.Name: The Checkpoint
Room.Description: You are met by a group of heavily armored knights. They check you over for contraband, and then allow you to pass on. One of the knights cautions to not stray into the desert, lest you lose your way.

Exit.Description: The continues east towards New Thalos.
The road continues west towards midgaard.

Room.Name: Along the Eastern Road
Room.Description: You are walking along a well-travelled road, just east of a heavily guarded checkpoint. You have covered about half the distance between the city of Midgaard and New Thalos. The air is getting drier and the heat more oppressive as you near the the barren wastes of the Sands of Sorrow.

Exit.Description: The road continues ahead, growing more arid as you near the desert.
You see a heavily guarded checkpoint to the west.

Room.Name: Along the Eastern Road
Room.Description: The tempatures are climbing as you near the Sands of Sorrow, a barren wasteland blasted by arcane powers. Ahead of you, the road is partially buried by the creeping sands, and the air grows even hotter.

Exit.Description: You see the Sands of Sorrow spilling over the road.
The road continues to the west, towards distant Midgaard.

Room.Name: Near the Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: The eastern road is losing ground to the creeping desert here. You stagger in the growing heat, and wonder if you have enough water. The endless waste of the Sands of Sorrows is south, and the road continues east and west. The sun paints illusions at the edge of your vision, one of them looks like a far off city...

Exit.Description: The road ahead is almost lost in the desert.
You see a clearer section of road.

Room.Name: Near the Sands of Sorrow
Room.Description: The road is almost completely swallowed by the desert here. The heat is sucking the life from your body, you wonder if it will ever end. To your south, the Sands of Sorrow stretch on for miles, and to the east you think you see the towers of a magnificent city...or is it just a mirage?

Exit.Description: You can barely make out enough road to follow.
The desert thins a little to the west.

Room.Name: On the Outskirts of New Thalos
Room.Description: The sun is hot enough to melt your armor, but salvation is at hand. To the east, you see the mighty gates of New Thalos, one of the most prosperous cities of all of Orthos. To the south, you see the endless wasteland of the Sands of Sorrows, and to the west you can barely make out a faint, but well-used, road leading to the City of Midgaard.

Exit.Description: You see the road to Midgaard, covered with sand.

Room.Name: At The Foot of The Mountains
Room.Description: You find yourself at the foot of the mountains, where it is much to steep to continue north or east. You see the lush, green forest of Miden'nir to the south and west.

Exit.Description: The forest of Miden'nir spreads out before you.
The forest of Miden'nir spreads out before you.

Room.Name: The Deep in the Forest of Miden'nir
Room.Description: The branches above you block out all direct sunlight, making the forest in this area very dark. The forest continues west, but mountains block further exploration in all other directions, except south, where you notice a small tunnel dug into the mountainside.

Room.Name: A Tunnel in the Mountains
Room.Description: The walls of this tunnel were carved out many years ago by the goblins of this forest. The floor is well worn, and continues south, into the mountain, or back north out into the forest.

Exit.Description: Outside, you see the forest of Miden'nir.
The tunnel continues to the south.

Room.Name: A Tunnel in the Mountains
Room.Description: The tunnel gets lighter to the north, presumably leading out, while to the south the passage gets smaller and smaller. A small alcove has been carved into the east wall.

Exit.Description: The tunnel gets wider in this direction.
You see a small alcove.
The tunnel gets smaller in this direction.

Room.Name: A Small Alcove
Room.Description: A small alcove has been carved out here. There are a bunch of twigs and leaves thrown into a pile here, probably serving as a bed.

Exit.Description: You see the main passageway.

ExtraDescription.Description: The twigs and leaves have all been piled together as a makeshift bed for some small humanoid.

Room.Name: A Tunnel in the Mountains
Room.Description: As you explore further into the mountainside, the tunnel gets smaller and smaller to the south. You almost have to hunch over to make your way thru this area. A small archway to the south leads into a large chamber.

Exit.Description: The tunnel continues north.
You see a small cavern.

Room.Name: The Goblin Headquarters
Room.Description: The tunnel widens into a large (well, large for goblins) cavern that serves as the living quarters for the goblins of Miden'nir. The bones of numbers woodland creatures are strewn about the room, the remanents of a recent meal.

Exit.Description: The tunnel heads north.

Room.Name: The Front of the Inn
Room.Description: You are standing on a well-worn path which opens into a clearing. An old, wooden building is here with smoke billowing from its chimney. A painted sign is visible on the porch to the west. You could go north or south around the building or leave this place and return to the forest.

Exit.Description: Back through the trees to the Miden'nir.
You can go south around the inn.
The front door of the inn beckons.

ExtraDescription.Description: +-------------------------------------------------+ | This zone originally written for Copper II DIKU | | by ? | | Modification and alterations for MERCmud DIKU | | by VampLestat 1 JAN 93 | +-------------------------------------------------+

Room.Name: North of the Inn
Room.Description: You are standing north of the inn. Things don't look much different from this angle. The air here is filled with smells of smoke and cooking. South, the front porch is waiting for you... or you can see if there is a back door.

Exit.Description: You see the front of the Inn.

Room.Name: South of the Inn
Room.Description: You are standing south of the inn. You could easily go north and enter through the front door, or west and to the rear of the establishment. You here some muffled cries from a tiny trail leading south of here.

Exit.Description: This way leads to the front of the inn.
The trail heads south.
This way leads to the back of the inn.

Room.Name: Behind the Inn
Room.Description: You now stand behind the inn. The smell here is not so pleasant as the keeper and his help throw a good deal of garbage here. A couple of piles of rubbish are to the west, but you will smell the worse for meddling there. As a clean alternative, you can go north or east around the inn.

Exit.Description: You can go around the inn this way.
Only rats and fool adventurers play in garbage.

Room.Name: The Woodsman Inn
Room.Description: You are in the common room of the Woodsman Inn. A thin haze of smoke sits in the air here. The Inn is often empty, as the forest has become overrun by goblins as of late, and it is no longer safe in these parts. The bar is just north of here. If you'd rather have your own table, one is empty to the south.

Exit.Description: The bar is here, manned by the innkeeper.
You can leave now and return to fresher air.
An empty table is a rare commodity.

Room.Name: The Ambush Point
Room.Description: This is a overgrown foot-trail south of the inn. It leads west, but you would be hard pressed to follow it far. A number of bushes are trampled on and some medium sized branches have been knocked down. Obviously there has been a battle here rather recently.

Exit.Description: The inn lies to the north.
A trail thru the woods.

Room.Name: The Bar
Room.Description: This is where people use to come and enjoy the food, drink and hospitality of the innkeeper, but as of late, he only serves the few adventurers that manage to survive a trip thru the forest. You can leave south and return to the common room.

Exit.Description: You may retreat south back to the common room.

Room.Name: The Bard's Table
Room.Description: You are in a darker corner in the Inn. A large round table with a few wooden chairs sits here. There is a large stain on the table, the remnants of a spilled drink.

Exit.Description: You see the main floor of the Inn to the east.

Room.Name: Garbage dump
Room.Description: You stand knee deep in garbage. YECCH!!! It smells terrible and who knows what vermin live in these piles of filth ...

Exit.Description: You can return to cleaner lands this way.

Room.Name: A Quieter Section of the Inn
Room.Description: There seems to be no one in this end of the Woodsman, probably a safe place to rest and lick your wounds ...

Exit.Description: You see the common room.

Room.Name: On the Trail of the Horsemen
Room.Description: The path continues east and west of here. You notice fresh tracks in the soft ground that show the horsemen fled to the west.

Exit.Description: Back to ambush point.
The trail continues.

Room.Name: On the Trail of the Horsemen
Room.Description: The path continues east and south. You notice fresh tracks in the soft ground that show the horsemen turned, and fled south.

Exit.Description: The trail continues.
The tracks lead south.

Room.Name: On the Trail of the Horsemen
Room.Description: The trail of the horsemen continues east and north along this path through the forest. The tracks are still fresh, so they must be near.

Exit.Description: The trail continues.
The tracks lead east.

Room.Name: A Dead End Trail
Room.Description: The path comes to an abrupt end here, as the trees close around you and make any further exploration impossible. Fresh tracks cover the ground, and end right here. The horsemen must be nearby.

Exit.Description: Back to along the trail.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Name: The Miden'nir
Room.Description: The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: Deep Forest
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: A Small Wooden Bridge
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

Room.Name: Deep Forest Junction
Room.Description: It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding. It might just be time to head back to somewhere safe.

NPC.name: wyvern
NPC.description: This huge winged creature looks really menacing. You are happy it doesn't APPEAR to be very hungry ... yet.
NPC.longDescription: A monstrous wyvern slowly circles just above your head.

NPC.name: goblin mountain
NPC.description: You see before you a small and twisted creature with knotted muscles.
NPC.longDescription: A mountain goblin is wandering about, mumbling to himself.

NPC.name: boy small
NPC.description: The poor boy has numerous cuts and scratches, but appears to be all right. He is apparently the only survivor of the ambush.
NPC.longDescription: A small boy sits here, licking his wounds.

NPC.name: innkeeper
NPC.description: The Innkeeper now spends most of his days waiting for customers, while the nights are spent watching out for goblins. His inn is no longer the happy place that is used to be in days past.
NPC.longDescription: The Innkeeper stands here, cleaning glasses.

NPC.name: bard
NPC.description: You can smell the alcohol on his breath from across the room. This poor bard has been sitting here quite a while, drinking himself into oblivion.
NPC.longDescription: A sullen bard is here, drinking away his problems.

NPC.name: horseman dark
NPC.description: The man is obviously an outlaw, and has no qualms about slashing you into little bits.
NPC.longDescription: A dark horseman is here, mounted on his black steed.

NPC.name: goblin lieutenant
NPC.description: The goblin lieutenant is rather angry, and looking for one of his men to beat up upon, but maybe you will do just fine ...
NPC.longDescription: A goblin lieutenant stands here, attempting to get his men in order.

NPC.name: goblin leader
NPC.description: The leader doesn't look too happy that you have found him here. He grabs for his shortsword and lunges for your neck.
NPC.longDescription: The goblin leader surveys the room.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace

Item.Name: sword short
Item.LongDescription: A rusted sword lies on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks heavier than your average short sword, but it could use some oiling.

Item.Name: spear long
Item.LongDescription: A blackened spear with an evil-looking blade lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This used to be a boar spear, but it has been used for more dangerous game.

Item.Name: helmet horned black
Item.LongDescription: A helmet with sharp black horns sits here.

Item.Name: cloak stained
Item.LongDescription: A worn and stained cloak is crumpled up on the floor.

Item.Name: bracer leather enchanted
Item.LongDescription: A leather bracer with mystic symbols sits here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This bracer is covered with runes of protection and luck in combat.

Item.Name: knife dagger
Item.LongDescription: A wide-bladed knife sits undisturbed on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's very sharp, you suspect this knife is more effective than many swords. It appears to be of elvish origins, and is made of finely crafted mithril, with a stylized ivory hilt.
